Scheme 2: Control experiments. Conditions for cyclic voltammetry: related compounds (5.0 mm) in LiClO4(0.24m) in CH3CN using glassy carbon as the working electrode, and a Pt wire and Ag/AgCl (3.5min KBr) as the counter and reference electrodes at 50 mV s–1scan rate. (a) CH3CN: EtOH (1:1) instead of CH3CN; (b)1a(5 mm); (c)1a(5 mm) + CH3CN:EtOH (1:1); (d) LiClO4(0.24m) in pure alcohol; (e) Background
